descriptionHtml:
This mod will add two spells to the game. One spell when casted will add 1000 lockpicks into your inventory which is better than the skeleton key since they weigh nothing and if your in prison just cast the spell and unpick the lock. The second spell will temporarily fortify your Lockpiking Skill by 100 points and unlock all the Lockpicking Perks for 10 seconds. It does not require not magicka or skill to cast. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1009/?]here[/url] And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/28898]Oblivion Lockpicking Spells[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
